abstract: The maker of Windows Mobile wants fewer, better devices.
snippet: The maker of Windows Mobile wants fewer, better devices.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft says it is responding to the fierce competition in the phone market by retooling and beefing up its mobile operating system–and by putting it on fewer devices.

headline.main: Microsoft: Expect Fewer Phones With Windows

abstract: Microsoft executive Robbie Bach discusses the challenges of trying to serve so many different types of customers.
snippet: Microsoft executive Robbie Bach discusses the challenges of trying to serve so many different types of customers.
lead_paragraph: This is part of a series of interviews with executives attending the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. Click here for all C.E.S. interviews.

headline.main: C.E.S. Interview: Microsoft’s Robbie Bach on the ‘Strategy Tax’
